page.title: 06FARMING
page.content:
There are many farms dotted around the area, ranging from the upland farms to the lowland farms on the banks of the Teifi. Most are dairy farms, although lately a few farmers have changed to meat producing units. Most of the high ground has now been cultivated and is used for sheep and cattle grazing.
QUESTIONNAIRE ON FARMING. 1.What made you go in for farming ? {My father needed help and he wanted { to keep the farm in the family.} 2.Have you always sold milk? { Yes,to the milk factory and locally. 3.How many cows did you have at the beginning? {Seventeen. 4.How many cows have you now? { Eighty five. {NIA DAVIES. {
